                "text": "Welcome back. So let's talk about some experience, shall we? Upon graduating from college in 2020, the summer of 2020, so we know heck of that time. Period of time was I received my Bachelor of Arts in Computer Science from Randolph-Macon College and from there I went to work for the DOD, working primarily on the H.C. component, doing some rotational projects as well, but primarily stationed down the H.C. component and from there I learned the whole nine yards. Anything rid you from the adjunct process to refining my skills and writing code and C++, and also designing parts of that H.C. component using motif and combining the C++ code and with generated code from motif. Some challenges were arose there just given that C++ is not for private for anybody to learn. And from there I really got to navigate the avenues where I really went on my career to go. So from there I landed myself here at where I am now at Center, working at the Software Engineer Analyst. I've worked on now two projects, working one with the DOD as well as our microservices and the different technologies that come with those microservices, and also learning architectural programming as well. And from there I landed myself doing some off to the side working at the Studio Now where I am at L.P. And I work on helping startups go from design to the MVP phase. And this is where I think I really start to find my passion and also my love for design as you may see. And I'm really excited for this May take me so stay tuned.",

                "text": "Let's talk interest in hobbies. I have a lot of interest in hobbies. I'm I'm about as explorative as they come. I'm an open book when it comes to about trying any new thing, but just you know not keep you guys here all day. My interest in hobbies range from hiking, snowboarding, I love snowboarding. I ride a motorcycle in my free time when the weather gets warm as you can see right here. I love the Joker by the way. I love DC. formdata.description: Upload up to 4 images instead of a video

request.description:
Create a Post

Valid post types: JOB, RAPIDHIRE, SOCIAL or SHORTVIDEO. You may upload a max of 1 video and 4 photos.

Acceptable file types:

Images: .jpg|.jpeg|.png|.gif|.heif|.heic|.tiff|.bmp

Videos: .mp4|.mov|.3gp|H.264|H.265

Documents: .pdf|.doc|.docx

  
File size limit: 100mb  
Field size limit: 1mb
